summary: Removed old admin panel directories (admin/ and Abadanhalywebadmin/) and rebuilt a fresh, clean admin panel with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Prisma, and modern UI. Created authentication system, products management, translations management, API routes, database schema, and comprehensive documentation. The new admin panel is practical, functional, and ready for professional development.
current_status: Admin panel rebuilt from scratch. Structure includes: Next.js 15 with App Router, Prisma SQLite database, password-based authentication, products CRUD operations, translations management with multi-language support (EN/TK/RU), clean UI components, and complete documentation. Ready for npm install and setup.
